extendedInfo.description: Car racing game.  Race people from all around the world.Start off racing a scooter, and work your way up to a Formula 1 race car fitted with KERS boost.30 tracks ranging from twisting snow tracks, to multi-route street races.Create private races with your friends.This version is ad supported.

reviews.title: Great racing game
reviews.comment: Awesome game... the only thing is that I wish u could race against the computer when you can\'t get on the server....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It\'s not an online game!
reviews.comment: It\'s a joke how online mode works. You race by yourself and then send a link to your friend so he can race and compare. I want a game where I can race with my friends at the same time. This is a poor idea. Uninstalled!
reviews.author: Tom Niemczewski

reviews.title: On tablet the accelerometer is on the wrong side
reviews.comment: It is like you need to play at 90 degrees from the game
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Finally.,but..
reviews.comment: Finally a 1 on1 race with no wreckers! But subsidie what\'s up with the no-sound? Didn\'t give it a 5 star cause l signed up for the race-cars not race -bikes.
reviews.author: Carlos Munoz

reviews.title: Fun but needs better multi
reviews.comment: Very simple and fun game. The only thing that knocks it down is the way it handles challenges against your friends. It\'s a pain! It should be more like bike race in that regard, all in app, simple and effective.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Greatly awesome!
reviews.comment: Very fun and addictive. Great game to finish and start over several times or just keep playing. The brake is to sensitive to the turbo and nitris. Kinda annoying when I go to boost and the darn thing stops.
reviews.author: Hans Breitweiser

reviews.comment: Well, I find this game very interesting because when I am bored, I have this game to play on. And I always win!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love the game, but it has a few annoying bugs
reviews.comment: I really love this game, but it feels a bit like beta software due to the bugs: sometimes the menu is almost twice as big as normal.  More annoying, often I get a double pre-race popup and thus I need to press start twice. For some reason this is also recorded as 2 different games, the real one and one which you will always lose. When these bugs are fixed I will update my score.
reviews.author: Tiddo Langerak

reviews.title: It\'s one of the best racers for phone! Really!
reviews.comment: Best racing game I\'ve found for phone
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Joshualascano
reviews.comment: This is saw cool
reviews.author: April Gallardo

reviews.comment: Great game! Fun fun fun,fun!:D The only bad thing is that you can\'t smash into the other driver. Weeeeeeeeeeee I can do cheerios!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool game
reviews.comment: I love the drifting not to sure about the multi player

reviews.comment: This game is really slow and easy. Great confidence builder I guess.

reviews.comment: This app is so fun best racing game.out there and u play against real people. My nsmes tonez.i.hold the world record.on.slide.for.motorbike\tIts so fun

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Wicked fun and it feels tight. The menu could be a bit more friendly so 4 stars.
